Package edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.pacman

Class GhostHouse

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.pacman.GhostHouse

  • public class GhostHouse
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a class to represent a Ghost House which holds ghost starting coordinates and tracks when ghosts are released onto the map to chase Pacman
    Author:
    Wei Tung Chen, Nicholas Duncan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GhostHouse​(Location topLeft, int width, int blockSize)
      Constructor for a ghosthouse object note that location must matched with the level map data that is created

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addGhost​(Ghost ghost)
      Method to add a ghost to a ghost house object Ghosts in ghost house will properly spawn and respawn
      void addGhosts​(java.util.List<Ghost> ghosts)
      returns the top left location of the ghost house Method to add ghosts to a ghost house object Ghosts in ghost house will properly spawn and respawn
      java.util.Queue<Ghost> getGhosts​()
      returns the ghosts list
      Location getTopLeft​()
      returns the top left location of the ghost house
      int getWidth​()
      returns the width of the ghost house
      void resetTimer​()
      Resets the timer on the ghost house must wait a full time interval before the next ghost is released
      void update​()
      This method updates the timer on the ghost house so that ghosts are released at proper intervals - call this in the logic updating loops

    • Constructor Detail

      • GhostHouse

        public GhostHouse​(Location topLeft,
                  int width,
                  int blockSize)
        Constructor for a ghosthouse object note that location must matched with the level map data that is created
        Parameters:
        topLeft - Location of the top left corner of the ghost house
        width - how many "blocks" the house encompasses (typically 1 block per ghost)
        blockSize - the size of each block as defined by the board class (must pass this in)

    • Method Detail

      • addGhost

        public void addGhost​(Ghost ghost)
        Method to add a ghost to a ghost house object Ghosts in ghost house will properly spawn and respawn
        Parameters:
        ghost - the ghost desired to be put into the ghost house

      • addGhosts

        public void addGhosts​(java.util.List<Ghost> ghosts)
        returns the top left location of the ghost house Method to add ghosts to a ghost house object Ghosts in ghost house will properly spawn and respawn
        Parameters:
        ghosts - the ghosts desired to be put into the ghost house

        public java.util.Queue<Ghost> getGhosts​()
        returns the ghosts list

      • update

        public void update​()
        This method updates the timer on the ghost house so that ghosts are released at proper intervals - call this in the logic updating loops

      • resetTimer

        public void resetTimer​()
        Resets the timer on the ghost house must wait a full time interval before the next ghost is released
